thread.title: The Changing of the Guard in the NBA

author: Ben Cohen
title: The Changing of the Guard in the NBA
text:
PHILADELPHIA—The first round of the NBA playoffs usually doesn’t matter.
It seems memorable as it’s happening, and then almost nobody actually remembers it. The first round gets elbowed aside by the second round, the conference finals, the Finals and free agency. The memes endure longer than the games.
Except this year. Because the effects...
